data.message:
Alexander Van Horn-Martin 
Why do you respond to someone  you do not care ... and also accused of having "everything" and you do not ... so it seems
Where do you get the right to condemn him ... to do what he does to write good music ... to others there are many fans helped with his lyrics ... Has stopped a while because he chose for his family and raised his daughters ... and still makes good music because he loves doing it and not for the money ... so why do you read and interfere with him while he does not interest you? Show some respect ... or else shut your big mouth ...
